STEFACTION

Stefaction is the creative brand of Stefan Kruger, a South African wedding, lifestyle, and all-round photographer and videographer known for capturing real, intimate moments with cinematic flair.

Stefan Kruger

Stefan Kruger, the creative force behind Stefaction, is a passionate photographer and filmmaker based in South Africa. With a talent for visual storytelling and a calm, observant approach, Stefan brings genuine emotion to every frame — whether it's a wedding, portrait session, or spontaneous adventure.

While weddings remain at the heart of his work, Stefaction isn’t just about “the big day.” Stefan is a versatile, all-round photographer and videographer who’s equally at home documenting couples in love, families, brands, and the everyday beauty of life. His style blends authenticity with an artistic edge — capturing the raw, the beautiful, and the quietly powerful moments that matter most.

Whether you're getting married, building your brand, or simply looking to preserve memories with intention and style, Stefaction is about more than just photos and video — it's about story, emotion, and timeless connection.
